sense.def:
Kadar je nebo ali razgled
hazy
, ne vidimo jasno, ker je v zraku meglica.

seg.quote: ...a hazy blue view beyond railings on a mountain pass.

sense.def:
To be hazy about things
ali
to have hazy thoughts
pomeni nejasno misliti ali biti zbegan.

seg.quote: She was hazy about her mother's origins.
The details are getting a bit hazy in my mind now.
